assert(x <= 50000 && y == 50000 + x); // Line A
assert(y >= z && x == (1000000 - y) + z); // Line B

assert((x >= 0 && x <= y) && (y == 50000 || y > 50000)); // Line A
assert(y >= z); // Line B

assert(x >= 0 && x <= 1000000); // Line A
assert(y >= z && y <= 50000 + min(50000, x)); // Line B
